channel.title: Posts on Backbone Cabal
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Backbone Cabal

item.description: aliases = [“dogma”,“informative”,“blog”,“showcase”,“about”] title = “Central Dogma - About” author = “YCabal Contibutors” tags = [“index”] Monopolizing transaction flow for arbitrage batching with miner support This is a strategy that realizes profit by smart transaction batching for the purposes of arbitrage by controlling transaction ordering. Right now every user sends a transaction directly to the network mempool and thus give away the arbitrage, front-running, back-running opportunities to miners(or random bots).
